definition: to raise one's foot/to stand on tiptoe/stilts

home/family/(polite) my (sister, uncle etc)/classifier for families or businesses/refers to the philosophical schools of pre-Han China/noun suffix for a specialist in some activity, such as a musician or revolutionary, corresponding to English -ist, -er, -ary or -ian/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: I say, let your imagination run away with you.
sentences.chinese: 我說，讓你的想象力蹺家與您合作。

sentences.english: The runaway girl wandered along the street, looking in the shop windows.
sentences.chinese: 這個蹺家的女孩在街上聞逛，瀏覽商店的櫥窗。
